SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi

Interface ServerRMIInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Server
public interface ServerRMIInterface extends Remote
The ServerRMIInterface is used by the client to communicate with the server. This interface is implemented by the server's remote object. It serves as the skeleton (proxy of the server) in the RMI communication. It extends the Remote interface, which is required for RMI communication. It exposes methods that the client can call, i.e. those of the controller.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      void connect(ClientHandlerInterface client) throws IOException
      Method used by the client to tell the server how to contact it.
      Parameters:
      client - The client's remote object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • createGame

      int createGame(ClientHandlerInterface client, int numberOfPlayers) throws IOException, NotExistingPlayerException, InterruptedException
      Creates a new game with the specified number of players and adds the client to it.
      Parameters:
      client - The client's remote object.
      numberOfPlayers - The number of players in the game.
      Returns:
      The ID of the created game.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      NotExistingPlayerException - If the player does not exist.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted.

      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.

      Adds a player to a game.
      Parameters:

      username - The username of the player.
      client - The client's remote object.
      Returns:
      The game to which the player was added.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.
      GameAlreadyStartedException - If the game has already started.

    • setReady

      ArrayList<Integer> setReady(int gameId, String username) throws IOException, DeckIsEmptyException, NotExistingPlayerException, InterruptedException, NotEnoughPlayersException
      Sets the player as ready for the game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game.
      username - The username of the player.
      Returns:
      A list of player IDs who are ready.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      DeckIsEmptyException - If the deck is empty.
      NotExistingPlayerException - If the player does not exist.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted.
      NotEnoughPlayersException - If there are not enough players.

      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game.
      Returns:
      A map of usernames to their ready status.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.

    • playCard

      Player playCard(int gameId, String username, PlayableCard card, PlayableCard otherCard, AngleOrientation orientation) throws RemoteException, NotExistingPlayerException, InvalidCardPositionException, RequirementsNotMetException, CardTypeMismatchException, AngleAlreadyLinkedException, NotTurnException
      Allows a player to play a card.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game.
      username - The username of the player.
      card - The card to be played.
      otherCard - The other card.
      orientation - The orientation of the card.
      Returns:
      The player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.
      NotExistingPlayerException - If the player does not exist.
      InvalidCardPositionException - If the card position is invalid.
      RequirementsNotMetException - If the requirements are not met.
      CardTypeMismatchException - If the card type is mismatched.
      AngleAlreadyLinkedException - If the angle is already linked.
      NotTurnException - If it's not the player's turn.

      NotExistingPlayerException - If the player does not exist.

    • drawCard

      void drawCard(int gameId, String username, CardType cardType, DrawPosition drawPosition) throws RemoteException, NotTurnException, NotExistingPlayerException, AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException, DeckIsEmptyException
      Allows a player to draw a card.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game.
      username - The username of the player.
      cardType - The type of the card to be drawn.
      drawPosition - The position of the draw.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.
      NotTurnException - If it's not the player's turn.
      NotExistingPlayerException - If the player does not exist.
      AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException - If the player already has three cards in hand.
      DeckIsEmptyException - If the deck is empty.
